backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing orders, user profiles, role assignment, and authorization with storage mixins and ensureUserRole bootstrap.
backend/old.mo: Legacy module defining earlier Order, UserProfile, and state structures for reference or migration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their functionality and roles in the app.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Comprehensive deployment guide for backend on Internet Computer and frontend on cPanel with configuration and troubleshooting.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, light/dark themes, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/public/.htaccess: Optional Apache config enabling compression, caching, MIME types, and security headers for static hosting.
frontend/public/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide for hosting only the frontend on cPanel while backend remains on the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with hash-based routing, authentication state, admin link logic, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Wrapper enforcing admin access with loading, error, login, and denial states.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentCon: Admin form for updating payment/contact status and notes with validation and submission.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredScr: UI screen prompting the user to log in before accessing protected actions.
frontend/src/components/SignaturePad.tsx: Canvas-based signature input component supporting drawing, clearing, and touch events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated/anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Hook to check admin status using actor, handling loading, errors, and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRole.ts: Ensures the authenticated user has the user role, running once per principal and invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Contains React Query hooks for submitting orders and fetching or updating order data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Offers hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile, ensuring roles and refreshing related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, typography, layout rules, and dark mode variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, setting up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin page that loads a single order, displays its details, photos, and signature, and allows updating payment contact status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin dashboard listing all orders with search, filters, statistics, and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component displaying a hero banner, product highlights, and navigation to ordering and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays a list of the user's orders, requires authentication, and shows detailed order info when one is selected.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows an order confirmation screen with payment contact instructions and displays the order ID.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: Presents an authenticated order submission form with validation, photo/signature upload, and form field management.
frontend/src/pages/PricesPage.tsx: Displays pricing details, feature highlights, and a call-to-action to start an order.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and update their profile information and checks for admin access.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Generates base-path-safe URLs for static assets and documents using the buildâ€™s BASE_URL.
frontend/src/utils/errorFormatting.ts: Formats errors into readable messages, redacts sensitive data, and extracts backend-specific error details.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Validates uploaded image files for type and size and converts files to byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/idGenerators.ts: Generates random names and addresses using local predefined lists.
frontend/src/utils/orderFormatting.ts: Formats backend timestamps and order/payment statuses into readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/usStates.ts: Exports a static list of US states for form dropdowns.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, issues, and feature requirements related to ensuring ensureUserRole() is called after authentication.
